nodes.bodyText:
Better to use WithFrameworkProperty instead :)
Sample here: 
  
    
      nuxeo/modules/platform/nuxeo-mail/src/test/java/org/nuxeo/mail/TestMailSessionBuilder.java
    
    
         Line 80
      in
      2387c0b
    
    
    
    

        
          
           @WithFrameworkProperty(name = CONFIGURATION_MAIL_DEBUG, value = "true")
